version_description:
The latest update has landed in Flick Golf FREE! 

Get on the green and enjoy: 
• Various bugs fixed 

Please rate and review the game on the App Store so we can bring features you'd like to see in future versions!

Hit the course with this MASSIVE new update!
• New Eliminator game mode
• New missions & challenges to complete
• Full HD graphics on iPhone 6 & 6 Plus
• Remastered for 2015 with a new look & style
• Full iOS 8 support
• Various bug fixes and other improvements

Please continue to rate and review the game. We read every comment to help us to create the games that you want!

Get ready to tee off with these new features!

• Double game time, increased from 30 to 60 secs
• Rebalanced scores for easier progress
• Last shot can gain time bonuses for extended play
• Stability improvements

Thanks for playing Flick Golf. Please rate the game to help us bring you more free updates and let us know what features you want to see next!

• Technical enhancements

Thanks for playing and please remember to rate or review the new version so we can keep bringing you free updates. 

Full Fat Team.

• Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Thanks for playing!
